metadata.title: CVE-2021-32268 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in function gf_fprintf in os_file.c in gpacbefore 1.0.1 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code. The fixed versionis 1.0.1.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
